</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the current command type (empty string when no command) for the commander of given vehicle (or for a given soldier). Returned value can be one of:
* "WAIT"
* "ATTACK"
* "HIDE"
* "MOVE"
* "HEAL"
* "REPAIR"
* "REFUEL"
* "REARM"
* "SUPPORT"
* "JOIN"
* "GET IN"
* "FIRE"
* "GET OUT"
* "STOP"
* "EXPECT"
* "ACTION"
* "ATTACKFIRE"
* "Suppress"
 </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[currentCommand]] vehicleName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_command = [[currentCommand]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[commandFire]], [[commandMove]], [[commandSuppressiveFire]], [[join]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
